name: items
label: Items
help_text: The accordion items (up to 10 items allowed).

children.name: title
children.label: Title
children.help_text: The visible header text of the accordion item.

children.name: content
children.label: Content
children.help_text: The hidden content of the accordion item, which appears when the user clicks on the accordion title.

name: footer
label: Footer
help_text: (Optional). Additional information — typically used for disclaimer content — that appears beneath all accordion items.

name: options
label: Display Options
help_text: Sizing and display settings for the items in this module.

children.name: background_theme
children.label: Background Theme
children.help_text: The background color theme for the module container.

children.name: display_style
children.label: Style
children.help_text: Determines the display style of each accordion item in this module.

children.name: display_sizing
children.label: Sizing
children.help_text: Determines the display size of each accordion item in this module.
